original_text: And thou shalt sanctify the breast of the wave offering, and the shoulder of the heave offering, which is waved, and which is heaved up, of the ram of the consecration, even of that which is for Aaron, and of that which is for his sons:
korean_text: 너는 그 흔든 요제물 곧 아론과 그의 아들들의 위임식 숫양의 가슴과 넓적다리를 거룩하게 하라

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt sanctify the breast of the wave offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 흔들어 드리는 제물의 가슴을 구별하여 거룩하게 하라

sentences.original_text: and the shoulder of the heave offering
of the ram of the consecration
even of that which is for Aaron
and of that which is for his sons:
